message:
ASP.NET Community Standup - Nov 18th, 2014 - Open Source All The Things
how to make it ? 
they said good point related to mono and xamarin 
mono run on ios application and android ( not mac or linux only )
but their version of dot net not compatible 100% ( they used reflector in some parts) as Microsoft code was not open source in all
so Microsoft ask them to build anew mono version based on .net version 5 so there's would no be a compatibility issues 
mono on their blog announced similar thing too 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ng0Y0zMOrxk&feature=youtu.be&a
story: Mohamed Hashem shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: ASP.NET Community Standup - Nov 18th, 2014 - Open Source All The Things
caption: youtube.com
